title: RESTAURANTS
description: Discover popular restaurants and dishes, and search for dishes in any category. Explore user reviews of dishes. Track your placed orders and leave feedback after delivery. You also have the option to become a seller, where you can showcase, add, update, and remove products, as well as manage incoming orders.

title: SOCIAL MEDIA
description: Share photos and content with your followers. Search for and send follow requests to other users. Customize your profile and switch to a private account. Like and comment on posts. Manage incoming follower requests and your sent requests.

title: E-COMMERCE
description: You can browse and add products to your cart, as well as manage and remove items. Update your user information, including adding new addresses. Access your order history, write product reviews, and log in as a seller to manage your products.

title: SOCKET.IO CHAT APP
description: A basic CHAT APP I made using SOCKET.IO.
